snippet: Eitam and Naama Henkin were driving with their children, ages 9 to 4 months, when they were fatally shot.

byline.contributor: Gabby Sobelman contributed reporting from Rehovot, Israel, and Diaa Hadid from Ramallah, West Bank.

abstract: Israel reports fatal shooting of Israeli settlers Eitam and Naama Henkin, who were driving with their four children in the West Bank; Israeli military deploys four extra battalions to West Bank in effort to prevent further  violence after Israeli news media reported Jewish settlers were throwing rocks at Palestinian vehicles near location of attack.
lead_paragraph: Eitam and Naama Henkin were driving with their children, ages 9 to 4 months, when they were fatally shot.

headline.print_headline: Attack on Car in West Bank Kills Israeli Parents of Four
headline.main: Palestinian Gunmen Kill Israeli Parents of 4 in West Bank
